Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-testscript-operation-codes-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 7 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplayDefinition
http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction5.0.0  history-instancehistory-instanceRetrieve the change history for a particular resource.
http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction5.0.0  history-systemhistory-systemRetrieve the change history for all resources on a system.
http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction5.0.0  history-typehistory-typeRetrieve the change history for all resources of a particular type.
http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction5.0.0  operationoperationPerform an operation as defined by an OperationDefinition.
http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction5.0.0  search-compartmentsearch-compartmentSearch resources in a compartment based on some filter criteria.
http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction5.0.0  search-systemsearch-systemSearch all resources based on some filter criteria.
http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction5.0.0  search-typesearch-typeSearch all resources of the specified type based on some filter criteria.

name: R5TestscriptOperationCodesForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.TestScriptOperationCode for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/testscript-operation-codes|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4 that is appropriate for use but unavailable in `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/testscript-operation-codes|4.0.1`.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/testscript-operation-codes|5.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* `ExampleScenario.process.step.operation.type` as Extensible
* `TestScript.setup.action.operation.type` as Extensible

Across FHIR versions, the value set has been mapped as:
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/testscript-operation-codes|5.0.0`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/testscript-operation-codes|4.3.0`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/testscript-operation-codes|4.0.1`

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction#batch`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction#capabilities`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction#create`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction#delete`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction#history`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction#patch`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction#read`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction#search`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction#transaction`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction#update`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction#vread`

Following are the generation technical comments:
One or more source concepts are either not mapped or broader than their targets, so the value set relationship is broadened.
The source value set has fewer active concepts (18) than the target (45), so the source is narrower than the target.
All concepts in the comparison are listed as identical.
The source and target value sets have the same number of active concepts (45).
Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/testscript-operation-codes|5.0.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/testscript-operation-codes|4.0.1` in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/5.0/ConceptMap/R5-TestscriptOperationCodes-R4-TestscriptOperationCodes` (`ConceptMap-R5-TestscriptOperationCodes-R4-TestscriptOperationCodes.json`)
